zh-cn: 资本论：政治经济学的批判

description.zh-cn: 由卡尔·马克思著作、弗里德里希·恩格斯编辑的一部历史唯物主义哲学和政治经济学的马克思基础理论文本，对资本主义进行了批判性的分析。
description.en: A foundational theoretical text in Marxist philosophy, economics and politics by Karl Marx, edited by Friedrich Engels, which presents a critical analysis of capitalism.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》的主要作者，德国哲学家、经济学家、历史学家、政治理论家、社会学家、记者和革命社会主义者。
description.en: The primary author of 'Das Kapital', a German philosopher, economist, historian, political theorist, sociologist, journalist, and revolutionary socialist.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者和商人，编辑并出版了《资本论》的第二、三卷。
description.en: A German philosopher, social scientist, journalist, and businessman who edited and published the second and third volumes of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》的创作国家。
description.en: The country where 'Das Kapital' was written.

description.zh-cn: 一种以生产资料私有制为基础的社会制度，《资本论》对其进行了批判性分析。
description.en: A social system based on private ownership of the means of production, which is critically analyzed in 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 现代经济学的前身，其理论被马克思在《资本论》中进行了分析和批判。
description.en: The predecessor to modern economics, whose theories were analyzed and critiqued by Marx in 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家，其辩证法方法被马克思吸收并应用于《资本论》。
description.en: A German philosopher whose dialectical method was adopted and applied by Marx in 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 一种哲学方法，被马克思用于分析资本主义社会。
description.en: A philosophical method used by Marx to analyze capitalist society.

description.zh-cn: 法国社会主义者，其思想影响了马克思。
description.en: A French socialist whose ideas influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 法国社会主义者，其思想影响了马克思。
description.en: A French socialist whose ideas influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 法国无政府主义者，其思想影响了马克思。
description.en: A French anarchist whose ideas influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 马克思写作《资本论》的目的之一是为现代工人运动提供科学依据。
description.en: One of Marx's aims in writing 'Das Kapital' was to provide a scientific basis for the modern workers' movement.

description.zh-cn: 马克思主义的组成部分，马克思希望通过《资本论》为其提供科学依据。
description.en: A component of Marxism for which Marx hoped to provide a scientific basis through 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思撰写《资本论》期间长期进行研究的城市。
description.en: The city where Marx conducted his research for many years while writing 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在此处进行了长达12年的经济材料研究，为撰写《资本论》做准备。
description.en: The institution where Marx conducted 12 years of research on economic materials in preparation for writing 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 古希腊哲学家，其思想是马克思的重要思想根源之一。
description.en: An ancient Greek philosopher whose thought was one of Marx's important intellectual sources.

description.zh-cn: 亚里士多德的著作，影响了马克思对资本的分析框架。
description.en: A work by Aristotle that influenced Marx's analytical framework for capital.

description.zh-cn: 亚里士多德的著作，影响了马克思对资本的分析框架。
description.en: A work by Aristotle that influenced Marx's analytical framework for capital.

description.zh-cn: 古典经济学家，其劳动价值论被马克思批判继承。
description.en: A classical economist whose labor theory of value was critically inherited by Marx.

description.zh-cn: 认为商品价值由生产它所需要的社会必要劳动时间决定的理论，被马克思批判继承。
description.en: The theory that the value of a commodity is determined by the socially necessary labor time required to produce it, which was critically inherited by Marx.

description.zh-cn: 通常被视为《资本论》的第四卷，是对19世纪剩余价值理论的批判史，由卡尔·考茨基编辑出版。
description.en: Often considered the fourth volume of 'Das Kapital', it is a critical history of the theories of surplus value in the 19th century, edited and published by Karl Kautsky.

description.zh-cn: 哲学家，编辑并出版了马克思的《剩余价值理论》。
description.en: A philosopher who edited and published Marx's 'Theories of Surplus Value'.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利经济学家，在其著作中对《资本论》进行了系统性批判。
description.en: An Austrian economist who systematically critiqued 'Das Kapital' in his writings.

nodes.id: 马克思主义体系之崩溃

zh-cn: 马克思主义体系之崩溃
卡尔·马克思及其体系的终结
en: Karl Marx and the Close of His System

description.zh-cn: 由欧根·冯·伯姆-巴韦尔克撰写的著作，对《资本论》的理论和逻辑进行了系统性批判。
description.en: A book written by Eugen von Böhm-Bawerk that systematically critiques the theory and logic of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 一种经济学理论，认为商品价值是主观的，与马克思的劳动价值论相对。
description.en: An economic theory which holds that the value of a commodity is subjective, in contrast to Marx's labor theory of value.

description.zh-cn: 哲学家，认为马克思的科学社会主义缺乏可证伪性，不能视作科学。
description.en: A philosopher who argued that Marx's scientific socialism lacks falsifiability and cannot be considered scientific.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》中文全译本的最早译者之一。
description.en: One of the first translators of the complete Chinese version of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》中文全译本的最早译者之一。
description.en: One of the first translators of the complete Chinese version of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 1938年出版了最早的《资本论》中文全译本。
description.en: Published the first complete Chinese translation of 'Das Kapital' in 1938.

zh-cn: 中共中央党史和文献研究院

description.zh-cn: 翻译了《资本论》的另一个中文译本。
description.en: Translated another Chinese version of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 出版了中共中央编译局翻译的《资本论》译本。
description.en: Published the version of 'Das Kapital' translated by the Central Compilation & Translation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 台湾历史上的一个时期，在此期间《资本论》等书籍被查禁。
description.en: A period in Taiwanese history during which books such as 'Das Kapital' were banned.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·马克思是《资本论》的主要作者。
description.en: Karl Marx is the primary author of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 弗里德里希·恩格斯在马克思去世后，编辑并出版了《资本论》的第二卷和第三卷。
description.en: After Marx's death, Friedrich Engels edited and published the second and third volumes of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 恩格斯是马克思的朋友和合作者。
description.en: Engels was Marx's friend and collaborator.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》对资本主义进行了批判性的分析。
description.en: 'Das Kapital' provides a critical analysis of capitalism.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在《资本论》中对古典经济学家的理论进行了仔细的分析和批判，并在此基础上提出了全新的观点。
description.en: In 'Das Kapital', Marx carefully analyzed and critiqued the theories of classical economists, and on this basis, he proposed entirely new views.

description.zh-cn: 马克思吸收了黑格尔的辩证法方法。
description.en: Marx absorbed Hegel's dialectical method.

description.zh-cn: 马克思认为他的目的是：“用辩证的方法，经过批判，得出一个科学的结论”。
description.en: Marx believed his purpose was: 'to arrive at a scientific conclusion through criticism, using the dialectical method'.

description.zh-cn: 法国社会主义者夏尔·傅立叶的思想影响了马克思。
description.en: The ideas of French socialist Charles Fourier influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 法国社会主义者克劳德·昂列·圣西门的思想影响了马克思。
description.en: The ideas of French socialist Henri de Saint-Simon influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 无政府主义者皮埃尔-约瑟夫·普鲁东的思想影响了马克思。
description.en: The ideas of anarchist Pierre-Joseph Proudhon influenced Marx.

description.zh-cn: 《资本论》旨在为现代工人运动提供科学的依据。
description.en: 'Das Kapital' aims to provide a scientific basis for the modern workers' movement.

description.zh-cn: 马克思为写作《资本论》而在伦敦的大英博物馆中进行了长达12年的研究。
description.en: Marx conducted research for 12 years in the British Museum in London for the writing of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 以亚里士多德为代表的古希腊哲学是马克思另一个重要的思想根源。
description.en: Ancient Greek philosophy, represented by Aristotle, was another important intellectual source for Marx.

description.zh-cn: 亚里士多德的《政治学》影响了马克思关于资本的分析框架。
description.en: Aristotle's 'Politics' influenced Marx's analytical framework for capital.

description.zh-cn: 亚里士多德的《尼各马可伦理学》影响了马克思关于资本的分析框架。
description.en: Aristotle's 'Nicomachean Ethics' influenced Marx's analytical framework for capital.

description.zh-cn: 马克思的经济批判一部分源于李嘉图的劳动价值理论。
description.en: Part of Marx's economic critique originated from Ricardo's labor theory of value.

description.zh-cn: 马克思批判继承了李嘉图的劳动价值论。
description.en: Marx critically inherited Ricardo's labor theory of value.

description.zh-cn: 马克思在去世前准备好了《资本论》第四卷的手稿，即后来的《剩余价值理论》。
description.en: Before his death, Marx had prepared the manuscript for the fourth volume of 'Das Kapital', which later became 'Theories of Surplus Value'.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·考茨基在1905年至1910年间编辑出版了马克思的《剩余价值理论》。
description.en: Between 1905 and 1910, Karl Kautsky edited and published Marx's 'Theories of Surplus Value'.

description.zh-cn: 欧根·冯·伯姆-巴韦尔克在《马克思主义体系之崩溃》一书中对《资本论》中的理论和逻辑进行了系统性的批判。
description.en: Eugen von Böhm-Bawerk systematically critiqued the theory and logic in 'Das Kapital' in his book 'Karl Marx and the Close of His System'.

description.zh-cn: 边际主义认为价值是主观的，与劳动价值论认为价值有客观标准的观点相对立。
description.en: Marginalism holds that value is subjective, which is contrary to the labor theory of value's view that value has an objective standard.

description.zh-cn: 卡尔·波普尔认为，马克思的所谓科学社会主义缺乏可证伪性，不能视作科学。
description.en: Karl Popper argued that Marx's so-called scientific socialism lacks falsifiability and cannot be considered science.

description.zh-cn: 郭大力与王亚南合作，于1938年出版了最早的《资本论》中文全译本。
description.en: Guo Dali, in collaboration with Wang Yanan, published the first complete Chinese translation of 'Das Kapital' in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 王亚南与郭大力合作，于1938年出版了最早的《资本论》中文全译本。
description.en: Wang Yanan, in collaboration with Guo Dali, published the first complete Chinese translation of 'Das Kapital' in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 郭大力和王亚南共同翻译了《资本论》。
description.en: Guo Dali and Wang Yanan co-translated 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 三联书店于1938年出版了由郭大力和王亚南翻译的《资本论》中文全译本。
description.en: Sanlian Bookstore published the complete Chinese translation of 'Das Kapital' by Guo Dali and Wang Yanan in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央编译局翻译了另一版本的《资本论》中文译本。
description.en: The Central Compilation & Translation Bureau translated another Chinese version of 'Das Kapital'.

description.zh-cn: 人民出版社出版了由中共中央编译局翻译的《资本论》译本。
description.en: The People's Publishing House published the version of 'Das Kapital' translated by the Central Compilation & Translation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾戒严时期，《资本论》被查禁，无法出版及销售。
description.en: During the martial law period in Taiwan, 'Das Kapital' was banned and could not be published or sold.
